name: Pharaoh's Maze
description: Pharaoh's Maze is a puzzle game. The concept is inspired by ancient Egypt tombs.  You will be playing first person view in a maze. There is fifty levels in the game. Each level has an access to another with a pharaoh coffin. You need to find the key in that level to succeed to pass to the another level.  Some power-ups will help you to play easily.
